name: "Little House"  Cast - Name the Character Quiz | Television | 20 Questions

questions.explanation:
Alice Garvey.

	Alice was tragically killed in a fire at the blind school, while trying to save Mary and Adam's son.  He was tragically killed as well.

Adam Kendall.

	We first met Adam in "I'll Be Waving as You Drive Away", the episode in which Mary loses her sight.  Adam regained his sight in an explosion.

Carrie Ingalls.

	Lyndsey and Sydney Greenbush were just their screen names.  The twins real name's are Robin and Rachel Bush.

Mary Ingalls.

	Mary Ingalls was the oldest of all the Ingalls' children.

Laura Ingalls.

	Laura Elizabeth Ingalls was named after her father's mother.

Eva Beadle.

	Miss Beadle was the school teacher.  She later married Adam Sims and moved away from Walnut Grove.

Willie Oleson.

	Jonathan Gilbert is Melissa Gilbert's brother.  Willie was always bugging and irrating Laura.  Doesn't that sound like something a little brother would do?

Caroline Ingalls.

	Caroline Ingalls was a remarkable women.  She always managed to keep the family togather with a smile, regardless what the circumstances were.

Grace Snyder Edwards.

	We first met Grace in "Mr. Edwards' Homecoming".  She was the post mistress.  In "Remember Me" she and Mr. Edwards married.

Doc Baker.

	Doc Baker was a very compassionate doctor who had everyone's best interest in heart.  He was there from the time the Ingalls moved to Walnut Grove until the end of the series.

Isaiah Edwards.

	Mr. Edwards' favorite song was "Old Dan Tucker".  He also taught Laura to spit, which Ma didn't approve of.

Lars Hansen.

	Pa bought the land at Plum Creek from Mr. Hansen.  Mr. Hansen ran the mill in town.

Almanzo Wilder.

	Dean Butler originally auditioned for the part of Adam Kendall.  The producers decided he was too tall for the part.  When the part of Almanzo Wilder came open, they remembered him and called him back.  Dean is eight years older than Melissa, so that worked out well.  The real Almanzo was actually ten years older than Laura.

Harriet Oleson.

	Mrs. Oleson appeared to be more interested in money than anything else.  Although she appeared to be quite difficult to get along with, she really loved her family and her community.

Nellie Oleson.

	Nellie Olsen was Laura's arch enemy.  Alison and Melissa are quite good friends though.

Percival Dalton.

	Mrs. Olsen hired Percival to teach Nellie how to run the resturant.  Percival and Nellie got married.

Hester Sue Terhune.

	Hester Sue helped Mary and Adam in the blind school.

John Sanderson Jr.

	John Sanderson Jr. was Mary's first fiance.  John was later killed in Chicago while in school and working for a newspaper.

Nels Oleson.

	Mr. Olsen owned the mercantile.  Mr. and Mrs. Oleson were complete opposites.

Charles Ingalls.

	Michael Landon was also known as Little Joe on "Bonanza".  Michael Landon also produced and directed several episodes of "Little House".  He was also known as quite the pratical joker.
